name: DomoticIPM
tagline: Academic Project for Human-Computer Interaction Course
body:
### Welcome to DomoticIPM
This an academic project for Human-Computer Interaction Course.
The application has the objetive to simulate a web based domotic system.
It will be separated in 6 stages, like it will be presented next.


### Implemented By  
Daniela Santos - 50870  
David Mealha - 51171  
Vladislav Pinzhuro - 49507  
Class P4

### Stage 1
Project proposal, defining the target users and goals to accomplish.  
[Project Proposal](https://github.com/DavidMealha/domoticIPM/blob/master/Project%20Proposal.pdf)

### Stage 2
User and Task Analysis, defining which are the types of users in the system, and what are they going to do.  
[User and Task Analysis](https://github.com/DavidMealha/domoticIPM/blob/master/User%20and%20Task%20Analysis.pdf)

### Testing Day
Document with the briefing and tasks presented to the testers.  
[Briefing and Tasks](https://github.com/DavidMealha/domoticIPM/blob/master/Prototype%20Testing.pdf)

### Stage 3
First Prototype Report.  
[First Prototype](https://github.com/DavidMealha/domoticIPM/blob/master/First%20Prototype.pdf)

### Stage 4
Computer Prototype Report.  
[Computer Prototype](https://github.com/DavidMealha/domoticIPM/blob/master/Computer%20Prototype.pdf)

### Stage 5
Heuristic Evaluation Report By Us.  
[Heuristic Evaluation](https://github.com/DavidMealha/domoticIPM/blob/master/Heuristic%20Evaluation.pdf)

Heuristic Evaluation of Our Project.
[Heuristic Evaluation](https://github.com/DavidMealha/domoticIPM/blob/master/UasbiliTyHeurestic-Domotic.pdf)

### Stage 6
Evaluation results
[Heuristic Evaluation](https://github.com/DavidMealha/domoticIPM/blob/master/Evaluation%20results.pdf)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
